version_description:
Thank you for using Schwab Mobile. We are working on improving the app and we welcome your input. In the app, go to Menu and select "Feedback" and share your experience and ideas for future enhancements.

In this release we've made moving between accounts easier in Tile View with a swipe, made the News available from the menu and added sorting options to Positions on the iPad.

Thank you for using Schwab Mobile. We are working on improving the app and we welcome your input. In the app, go to Menu and select "Feedback" and share your experience and ideas for future enhancements.

In this release we've added a Touch ID toggle to the login screen, improved the stability of the app and resolved a few bugs.

Thank you for using Schwab Mobile. We are working on improving the app and we welcome your input. In the app, go to Menu and select "Feedback" and share your experience and ideas for future enhancements.

In this release we‘ve expanded the options and simplified the design of the Transfers & Payments functions, improved the stability of the app and resolved a few bugs.

Thank you for using Schwab Mobile. We are working on improving the app and we welcome your input. In the app, go to Menu and select "Feedback" and share your experience and ideas for future enhancements.

In this release we've expanded the options and simplified the design of the Transfers & Payments functions, improved the stability of the app and resolved a few bugs.

Thank you for using Schwab Mobile. We are working on improving the app and we welcome your input. In the app, go to Menu and select "Feedback" and share your experience and ideas for future enhancements.

In this release we’ve made account information available for View Only roles, added the ability to view account details for the new Charles Schwab Credit Cards from American Express and resolved a few bugs.

Thank you for using Schwab Mobile. We are working on improving the app and we welcome your input. In the app, go to Menu and select "Feedback" and share your experience and ideas for future enhancements.

In this release we’ve added a new in-depth experience for equity awards account holders that offers a detailed view of share holdings, awards and upcoming vest dates.

Thank you for using Schwab Mobile. We are working on improving the app and we welcome your input. In the app, go to More, Contact Us and select "Provide Feedback" to share your experience and ideas for future enhancements.

This release includes improved app performance, design updates, and new features that have been requested. Notable new features as part of this release include:

• Pull to refresh to update market information
• Universal symbol search for easier access to quotes
• Customizable menu options to create an individualized experience
• Auto-capture check image during check deposit

Thank you for using Schwab Mobile. We are working on improving the app and we welcome your input. In the app, go to More, Contact Us and select "Provide Feedback" to share your experience and ideas for future enhancements.

Here is what we’ve been working on based on your feedback:

• Updated fonts to help improve readability for users with larger device font settings
• Removed Auto-Flash on Mobile Check Deposits to help increase image clarity
• Bug fixes

Thank you for using Schwab Mobile. We are working on improving the app and we welcome your input. In the app, go to More, Contact Us and select "Provide Feedback" to share your experience and ideas for future enhancements.

Here is what we’ve been working on based on your feedback:

• Improved Equity Awards Experience with new Summary dashboard and Events view
• Push notifications will be shown for your initiated, completed or cancelled wire transfers
• Bug fixes

Thank you for using Schwab Mobile. We are working on improving the app and we welcome your input. In the app, go to More, Contact Us and select "Provide Feedback" to share your experience and ideas for future enhancements.

Here is what we’ve been working on based on your feedback:

• Added new categories to more accurately communicate notifications
• New actions available through the Equity Awards Center, including grant acceptance, ESPP enrollment, and more
• Bug fixes

• An updated login experience including market indices at a glance
• Change your login ID, password, and security Q&A with Security Center
• New or existing clients can open new accounts directly from the app
• View trailing stop orders on equities and options
• Bug fixes

Thank you for using Schwab Mobile. We are working on improving the app and we welcome your input. In the app, go to “More”, “Contact Us” and select “Provide Feedback” to share your experience and ideas for future enhancements.

•General bug fixes and stabilization updates

Thank you for using Schwab Mobile. We are working on improving the app and we welcome your input. In the app, go to “More”, “Contact Us” and select “Provide Feedback” to share your experience and ideas for future enhancements.

• Quickly access your accounts with Passcode Login option
• Launch and Login, fewer steps required
• Reset your password from the login page
• Bug fixes

Thank you for using Schwab Mobile. We are working on improving the app and we welcome your input. In the app, go to “More”, “Contact Us” and select “Provide Feedback” to share your experience and ideas for future enhancements.

• Select categories of push notifications and text messages on the new message settings page
• Utilize 3D Touch quick actions on eligible devices to quickly navigate to quotes, positions, trade, or check deposit
• Press and hold a stock or ETF on positions and watchlist items to start a trade
• New Equity Award Center® trade ticket and order status
• View your Pledged Asset Line® balances, positions, and history
• Bug fixes

Thank you for using Schwab Mobile.

• General bug fixes and stabilization updates

Thank you for using Schwab Mobile. We are working on improving the app and we welcome your input. In the app, go to “More” and select “Feedback” to share your experience and ideas for future enhancements.

• All new account summary page featuring Personal Value Chart, view of external accounts, and more
• Select a futures account to view on StreetSmart Mobile™
• Mark messages as read in the new Message Center
• Make payments to Pledged Asset Line® and Overdraft Credit Line
• Trade Pre-IPO awards through the Equity Award Center®
• Bug fixes
• General bug fixes and stabilization updates

• Navigate quickly with the new menu
• View positions in external accounts added on Schwab.com
• Now supports Face ID®
• Refreshed Markets experience with new modules for Futures, Top Mentions, and Market Volatility
• View a count of new messages and take actions on messages in Message Center
• Update email address and phone numbers on the new My Profile page
• Receive information about vested shares through Equity Award Center®
• Bug fixes

• View Statements and Reports for investment and Schwab Bank accounts
• Login seamlessly with quick access to your accounts
• Now optimized for iPhone X
• Control display of Personal Value and historical chart at the top of the summary view
• Swipe on positions on watchlist to delete, buy, sell, and more
• View FAQs for information about login, notifications, deposit, and more
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements
• General bug fixes and stabilization updates
• Fixes a bug in which the device watchlist was unexpectedly cleared for some clients

• New Media Center experience with access to Schwab Podcasts, YouTube videos, and more
• Add and manage your external accounts on Account Summary
• Deposit checks seamlessly
• Edit your home address in My Profile
• View Historical Awards in your Equity Award Center®
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements

• Redesigned symbol search with recently searched symbols
• View and edit account addresses on MyProfile
• View scheduled grants on your Schwab Charitable account
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements

• Enhanced Travel Notice submission to help you travel confidently with your Schwab Visa Debit Card
• Redesigned symbol search with recently searched symbols
• View and edit account addresses on MyProfile
• Request and monitor checks or online account transfers from your Equity Awards account
• View scheduled grants on your Schwab Charitable account
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements
• Fixes a bug in which the device watchlist was unexpectedly cleared for some clients

• Deposit checks to your Simplified Employee Pension (SEP) IRA

• View your routing numbers for direct deposits and outgoing payments
• Manage your Charitable account with new grant actions
• View and manage trusted devices from the mobile app

• Access more in-depth information on stocks, ETFs, mutual funds, and indices

• Review your check deposit maximum amount as it may have changed
• View your statement for Equity Awards account
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements

General bug fixes and stabilization updates

• See when to expect your 1099 tax forms for your brokerage account and download when available
• Learn more about Schwab Intelligent Portfolios®

• Contribute to eligible Individual Retirement Accounts directly from your Schwab Bank High Yield Investor Checking® or High Yield Investor Savings® account.
• Monitor your Schwab Bank Visa Platinum® Debit card activity by setting custom alerts
• Supplement your investment research with newly added Market Reports
• View customized account groups (managed on Schwab.com summary settings)

• Access more information for your fixed income positions

• Access recent symbols list for trading

• Set up a travel notice to make sure your card stays active while you’re traveling.
• Instantly generate a balance letter to verify the status and balance of your accounts

• Keep contact information up to date by visiting the My Profile screen

• Own any of America’s leading companies in the S&P 500 for as little as $5, even if their shares cost more.
• From today, you can rate us on your experience in the App. Be sure to visit the Feedback page to rate us

• Now you can replace your Schwab Bank Visa® Platinum Debit Card if lost or damaged

• Now you can use the Schwab Intelligent Assistant in your Mobile app

• As of November 18th, Schwab Mobile for iOS will only provide updates for iOS 13 or higher. To ensure that you can download the latest updates, please update your iOS or iPadOS version to 13 or higher.
• You can upload your documents via the message center
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements
•  Bug fixes and performance enhancements
•  Bug fixes and performance enhancements

• Schwab Stock Slices™ now allows clients to purchase up to 30 slices at one time. If making a purchase in a custodial account, a New Owner's Guide can be shared with the recipient.
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements

• Schwab Stock Slices™ now allows clients to purchase up to 30 slices at one time. If making a purchase in a custodial account, a New Owner's Guide can be shared with the recipient.
• This release fixes a bug associated with iOS watchlists.

• Manage your cards from the Me Menu
• Accessibility enhancements for the Intelligent Assistant
• Date Picker Enhancements
• Bug Fixes include : Articles cut off in vertical or landscape view, Some symbols displayed incorrectly on different pages and Positions, Some users seeing Terms and Conditions frequently, Login issue with accessibility features enabled, Some clients experiencing Financial Planning pop ups

• View annual IRA contribution limits when making a contribution to an IRA
• Bugs fixes: Some users experienced: Options data not showing correctly on some pages, Refreshing on some trade pages not working correctly, Voiceover reading incorrect information, Inability to update phone or address info, Voiceover not reading some information, Cost basis not displayed on some pages

• Schwab Market Commentary: Help and guidance now available in Media Center
• What’s new cards Enhancements
• Bugs that were fixed: Crash when Navigating to some pages, Faster Refresh on transaction history, CNBC Display viewable without issue

• Error messaging enhancements
• Enhanced Accessibility Features
• Bugs that were fixed: Broken link on tax forms, Date picker for a Travel Notice, Time not updating on Trade Stock screen, and Crash bugs
